transport.question: I have wheels and you push me to get around. What am I?

hints.text: 👶 Babies often use me
🌳 I sometimes go through the park
🧍 A parent often pushes me

transport.question: I go on the road, have four wheels, and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 You need a license to drive me
⛽ I need fuel to run
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families often travel in me

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take many people on vacation. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly above the clouds
✈️ I have wings but I am not a bird
🌍 I can take you to different countries

transport.question: I travel on water and can be used for fun or to carry goods. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float on the water
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still
🚢 I can be big or small

transport.question: I travel on rails and take many people to different cities. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a track
🚏 I stop at stations
📣 You'll hear a loud whistle from me

transport.question: I take people all around the town and stop often to pick people up. What am I?

hints.text: 🅿️ I have a special place to stop on the street
👨‍✈️ A driver controls me
🏫 You might ride me to school

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to push me.

hints.text: ⛑️ You should wear a helmet when using me
🤸 You can do tricks with me
🧑‍🦽 Some people use me for racing

transport.question: I fly but I'm not an airplane, I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 You might see me in a rescue mission
🚨 I can hover in one place
🤕 I can land on the roof of a hospital

transport.question: I take people to the moon and explore space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go very, very fast
👩‍🚀 Astronauts use me
✨ I travel beyond the Earth

transport.question: I travel underground and carry many people quickly through the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You can ride me under a busy street
🗺️ I have lots of stops on my line
💡 The stations can be very colorful

ocean.question: I have many colors and fish swim through me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I grow on the ocean floor.
🐠 Fish like to hide in me.
🌈 I can be red, green, or brown.

ocean.question: I am very big, and salty water covers most of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am a large body of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🧂 My water is not good to drink.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean. I sing songs.

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🌊 I breathe air.
🎵 Some kinds of me are very big.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the sand and have strong pincers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have a hard shell.
🤏 I can pinch you with my claws.
🚶I don't walk forward.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink.

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 My ink can hide me from danger.
🖐️ I have many arms to hold things.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. Some people are scared of me!

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🦈 I am a predator

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with a hard shell, and I move very slowly. I sometimes get mistaken for a rock.

hints.text: 🐢 I lay eggs on the beach.
🥬 I eat plants and seaweed.
😴 I can live for a very long time.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that swims and is known for being smart and playful. I have a blowhole on top of my head.

hints.text: 🤸 I love to jump out of the water.
🗣️ I can talk to others of my kind with clicks and whistles.
🫧 I use my blowhole to breathe.

ocean.question: I am a very small and colorful fish that lives among poisonous tentacles.

hints.text: 🧡 I am orange and white.
🏠 My home is a sea anemone.
🐠 A movie is named after me.

ocean.question: I am a flat fish that hides on the ocean floor and can change color to blend in.

hints.text: 👁️ Both of my eyes are on the same side of my body.
🏞️ I can look like sand or rocks.
🪨 You might step on me without even knowing.
